function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing of temperature data with mobile app via Bluetooth can lead to unauthorized access of sensitive health information.","Impact":"Privacy breach, potential misuse of health data.","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption and authorization protocols for data transmission.","Technologies":"Encryption technology, secure authentication methods.","People":"Infants, caregivers, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Manufacturers, app developers, healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Wearable devices may not be accurate, leading to incorrect temperature readings and potential misdiagnosis or improper treatment.","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, improper treatment, compromised health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of the sensors, adherence to regulatory standards for medical devices.","Technologies":"Calibration tools, quality assurance processes, compliance with medical device regulations.","People":"Infants, caregivers, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Manufacturers, regulatory authorities, healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Use of pulse oximeter sensors at non-standard locations or with inaccurate sensors can lead to false readings and misinterpretation of oxygen saturation levels.","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, improper treatment, compromised health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Education on proper usage, validation of sensor accuracy, adherence to recommended measuring sites.","Technologies":"Educational materials, sensor calibration tools, adherence to guidelines for sensor placement.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Manufacturers, healthcare organizations, regulatory authorities."}]}
